chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: With the decision to re-write Enlightenment for DR17, came the decision to build a support infrastructure that could support Enlightenment well into the future and other projects needing a solid base of libraries. This formed the basis of the Enlightenment Foundation Libraries (EFL).

The EFL has grown to encompass many of the features required by the window manager development and many of the applications that will be run on top of that WM. There are currently libraries to handle transparency, configuration, video, core event loops, and interface abstraction.
This book is an attempt to be your road map through this foundation.
